intro:
hakobune : Takahiro Yorifuji, AKA Hakobune, makes music by building harmonic layers of guitar reverb. While the vast sonic landscapes intensify and grow more complex with each layer, they never fail to invoke a state of calm and reflection. Yorifuji's approach to composition is uncomplicated and instinctive, resulting in an organic, undulating aural experience. Like many musicians who lean towards the tranquil nature of the ambient genre, the Tokyo-based musician also likes it ultra fast and super loud with his powerviolence band Whales. Releasing his work in limited batches on various labels like Underground Pollution Records, Dronarivm and Constellation Tatsu, or his personal favourite Whispering In Their Presence, which was originally released on Sunshine Ltd, Yorifuji will sell versions of the sold-out albums on his bandcamp page.

하코부네로 알려진 타카히로 요리후지는 기타의 리버브를 통해 얻어진 배음의 층으로 음악을 만드는 도쿄 엠비언트씬의 대표적인 아티스트이며 Dronarivm, Constellation Tatsu등을 통해 작품활동을 이어가고 있다
name: 하코부네
